message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You're getting a whole dollar!
Alice, I know you're expecting a lot, but consider this a good deal. My money is worth less each round, and yours is worth a lot less. I'm being generous!
Bob, I'm willing to compromise. I'm taking a bigger hit from inflation, so this is fair, right?
Alice, this is the best deal you're going to get. My money is losing value very quickly. Take it.
